html: So excited to announce today our @modestgolf intention to bring a Ladies European Tour Event back to Northern Ireland in 2019... The event will run alongside the Northern Ireland’s Men’s Event and will be the first of its kind in Europe. A very exciting time for our business..pic.twitter.com/6jrLmIpbob
text:
So excited to announce today our @modestgolf intention to bring a Ladies European Tour Event back to Northern Ireland in 2019...

The event will run alongside the Northern Ireland’s Men’s Event and will be the first of its kind in Europe.

A very exciting time for our business..pic.twitter.com/6jrLmIpbob

html: Best of luck this week to all the players competing in the NI Open at @GalgormCastle! We are delighted to be involved again @modestgolf. I cant make it this year due to my tour but can’t wait to come back in 2019! Enjoy the week and if your can, go and watch some great golf!
text:
Best of luck this week to all the players competing in the NI Open at @GalgormCastle! 
We are delighted to be involved again @modestgolf.
I cant make it this year due to my tour but can’t wait to come back in 2019!
Enjoy the week and if your can, go and watch some great golf!
